messages.content: This election is the most important for more than a decade. The future of our economy, public services, young people and their families. Many jobs, pensions and local businesses are at stake.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Investing in jobs, pensions and local businesses.
Defending front line services like police, hospitals, fire and ambulance services.
Investing in our schools and support for children, young people and their families.
Ensuring our older people get the care and support they deserve.
Working for a more sustainable environment locally, nationally and internationally.

issues.education: Investing in our schools and support for children, young people and their families.
issues.environment: Working for a more sustainable environment locally, nationally and internationally.
issues.health: Defending front line services like hospitals

leaflet.personalStatement: I am passionate about our local community and will fight to ensure that we really do get a future that is fair for all.

contactInformation.address: Alison Moore, 38 Church Lane, London N2 8DT
